titles: A pleasant history of a gentleman in Thracia which had foure sonnes, and three of them none of his own; shewing how miraculously the true heire came to enioy his inheritance. To the tune of, Chevy Chace.
author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?, attributed author.
notes: Printer's name and publication date from STC.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library.
